description: DGPx1 is a fusion protein of a deamidated gliadin peptide fused with a carrier protein to be used as antigen for the detection of antibodies specific for deamidated gliadin. The deamidated gliadin peptide is based on the 26-mer gamma gliadin (Dørum S. et al., J Proteome Res. 2009; 8:1748-55).
name: Biotinylated DGPx1
